text.en: Check Exalted statistics and Recommended Comps for each variation. [Click]

text.ko: 귀인 통계가 추가되었습니다. 귀인 구성별 통계와 3 귀인 추천 조합도 확인하세요! [클릭]

skill.name: Training Dummy
skill.desc: Use on a champion to spawn a movable target dummy nearby. Cannot be used in combat.

skill.name: Voidborn
skill.desc: The Voidspawn gains bonus Health and Attack Damage based on the current Stage.

skill.name: Phantom Blade
skill.desc:
20% Shred the current target for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to them. Heal Health.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

skill.name: Love Bomb
skill.desc:
Deal magic damage to the current target and magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Fated Bonus: Gain 30 AP.

skill.name: Lunar Barrage
skill.desc:
Rain meteors through the row with the most total enemy Health. Meteors deal magic damage split between all enemies hit. Deal magic damage to the current target. All enemies hit are 20% Shredded for 6 seconds.

Grant Attack Speed split amongst allies in Alune's row for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

skill.name: Herbal Tea-rs
skill.desc: Over the next 3 seconds, heal Health and cry on adjacent units. Tears heal allies for Health and deal magic damage to enemies.

skill.name: Get'em. Tibbers!
skill.desc:
Passive: Heal Health when damaging a Burning enemy.

Active: On first cast, hop on Tibbers, gaining max Health and Stunning enemies within 2 hexes for 1.5 seconds.

Deal magic damage, Burn, and Wound enemies within 2 hexes for 8 seconds.

Burn: Deal 1% of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%.
stats: Bonus Health: 15% HP + Bonus Health AP

skill.name: Duskwave
skill.desc:
20% Sunder the nearest 3 enemies for 7 seconds. Then fire 3 shots at them, dealing physical damage each.

Fated Bonus: Gain 25% Attack Damage.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
stats: Total Damage: Damage AD + Damage AP

skill.name: Rain of Shards
skill.desc:
Passive: Start with 15 arrows. Gain 1 every 3 attacks.

Active: Fire a volley split between the current target and the 3 closest enemies within range, dealing physical damage per stored arrow for a total of physical damage.

skill.name: Blight
skill.desc: Fire a beam through the current target, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Spawn a Guardian adjacent to the first enemy hit with some Health. The Guardian does not move or attack.

skill.name: Meep Meep!
skill.desc: For the next 6 seconds, attacks instead throw 2 Meeps, each dealing physical damage and magic damage.

skill.name: Ace in the Hole
skill.desc: Fire a bullet towards the farthest enemy, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit.

skill.name: Eruption
skill.desc:
Gain Shield for 4 seconds and breathe a cone of fire, dealing magic damage, Burning, and Wounding enemies hit for 9 seconds.

Burn: Deal 1% of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 50%

skill.name: Decimate
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to adjacent enemies. For the next 4 seconds, attacks deal bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Purification Rites
skill.desc: Heal Health and create a 1-hex sacred zone around Diana for 4 seconds, taking 30% reduced damage from enemies outside the zone. While the zone is up, Diana's attacks deal bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Money Dance
skill.desc:
Passive: When you gain interest, gain permanent Health per gold collected. (Gain more Health per Round in Hyper Roll)

Active: Heal Health over 2 seconds. Kobuko's next attack deals bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Savior's Protection
skill.desc:
Taunt enemies within 3 hexes and gain Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds. Galio is immobile and unstoppable during this time.

After, deal magic damage to all enemies in range and grant Shield to allies in range for 4 seconds.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

skill.name: Courage
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 5 seconds. Garen's next attack deals additional damage.

skill.name: Boulder Toss
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain Attack Damage upon attacking or getting hit, up to 50 times.

Active: Fling a boulder at the current target, dealing physical damage to targets in a line.

skill.name: A Brush with Fate
skill.desc: Create an expanding paint pool around the most units that heals allies within for Health every second for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, it explodes, healing allies within for Health and dealing magic damage to enemies.

skill.name: Prophet of Spirits
skill.desc: Gain Shield and summon a tentacle near the current target for 4 seconds. The tentacle slams every second, dealing magic damage in a line and healing illaoi for Health.

skill.name: Blade Dance
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks send blades that dart between enemies, dealing physical damage and 30% Sunder for 5 seconds. Cast every 8 attacks.

Active: Command the blades to swiftly strike the three lowest Health enemies, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

Irelia converts 25% of bonus attack speed into faster blade movement, and 70% into Attack Damge.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
stats: Active Damage: Active Damage AD + 100% AP

skill.name: Heavenly Winds
skill.desc: Grant Shield to the 2 lowest Health ally for 4 seconds. Then, deal magic damage to the 2 nearest enemies.

skill.name: Counter Strike
skill.desc: Gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist for the next 2 seconds. Afterwards, deal magic damage to adjacent enemies. The current target takes magic damage and is Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Inkstorm
skill.desc: Fire 20 waves at the current target over 2 seconds, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit. If an enemy is hit by 10 waves, they take damage per wave instead.
stats: Wave Damage: Wave Damage AD + Wave Damage AP
Amplified Wave Damage AD: Amplified Wave Damage AD+ 10% AP

skill.name: Celestial Flames
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal bonus magic damage.

Active: Fire a wave at the current target that deals magic damage to all enemies hit.

skill.name: Shadow Assassin
skill.desc:
On first cast, transform, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. While transformed, gain 30% Critical Stirke Chance and critical attacks damage adjacent enemies. If the spin only hits one enemy, the damage in increased by 100%.

Subsequent casts deal physical damage to units in a line through the target instead.
stats: Subsequent Damage: Subsequent Damage AD + Subsequent Damage AP

skill.name: Leap!
skill.desc: Leap towards the lowest Health enemy within 3 hexes and deal physical damage.

skill.name: Flourish of Arrows
skill.desc:
Dash away from the current target and deal magic damage to them and magic damage to the nearst enemy.

Fated Bonus: Gain 18% Attack Speed.

skill.name: Raining Artillery
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to the lowest Health enemy within range. Every 3 casts, gain +1 Attack Range.

skill.name: Dragon's Dance
skill.desc:
Kick the target's sprit out of their body, dealing physical damage. 30% Mana Reaving them, and Stunning them. Enemies hit by the sprit take physical damage. Gain Shield for 3 seconds.

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast

skill.name: Eep!
skill.desc:
Hurl an orb towards the current target, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and adjacent enemies. It continues rolling as a smaller orb, dealing magic damage to enemies it hits.

Every third cast launches a mega orb at her target that deals magic damage and splits into 3 smaller orbs that roll towards the farthest enemies.

skill.name: Let 'em Brew
skill.desc:
Steep the cureent target in a teapot. Stunning and dealing magic damage over a few seconds. If they die, there's a 50% chance that Lissandra turns them into a loot orb. Otherwise, Lissandra throws the teapot at the largest group of enemies, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit. (Rewards are doubled in Hyper Roll)

If the target is the last enemy remaining, kill them instantly.

skill.name: Bunny Binding
skill.desc: Throw a spirit bunny towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies along the way, reduced by 30% each time it his an enemy. The first 2 enemies hit are Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Topaz Skin
skill.desc: For 8 seconds, gain Armor and attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a cone.

skill.name: The Tempest's Torment
skill.desc:
Create a blizzard at the largest clump of enemies within range that deals magic damage over 3 seconds and Chills for 1 second.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 10%

skill.name: Depth Charge
skill.desc: Send 3 shockwaves towards the most enemies in a line, dealing magic damage and Stunning all enemies hit.

skill.name: Hop Blossom
skill.desc: Hop into the air, reducing damage taken and Healing Health over 2 seconds. After, slam down and deal magic damage to adjacent enemies.

skill.name: Forge of the Forest
skill.desc: Gain shield for 4 seconds. Channel and forge upstoppably over 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies over the duration. After, toss an ephemeral Completed item to the nearest ally.

skill.name: Supreme Display of Talent
skill.desc: For 4 seconds, attacks deal bonus physical damage to the target and physical damage to enemies behind them. Qiyana will dash to find the best angle.
stats: Primary Damage: 150% AD + Primary Damage AP

skill.name: Grand Entrance
skill.desc: Dash into the largest group of enemies and deal magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex range. Gain Shield for each enemy hit for 2 seconds and reduce their damage by 10% for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Uproot
skill.desc: Gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. Stun nearby enemies for 1 second and deal magic damage.

skill.name: Broken Wings
skill.desc: Deal physical damage to the current target. Every 3rd cast, also deal physical damage to adjacent enemies and heal for Health.

skill.name: Absolution
skill.desc: Fire a laser 2 Hexes beyond the current target, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Grant Attack Damage to Senna and allies to the left and right for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Light and Shadow
skill.desc:
Passive: At the start of combat, squat adjacent units in the same row. Permanently gain 2% Attack Damage for each 1000 Health squatted. (Gains are doubled in Hyper Roll)

Active: Slam the current target forward, Stunning them and dealing physical damage. Deal Secondary damage plus % of the target's maximum health as physical damage to enemies within 2.5 hexes.

Fated Bonus: Gain 15% Omnivamp.
stats: Secondary Damage: 120% AD + Secondary Damage AP

skill.name: Spirit's Refuge
skill.desc: For 4 seconds, reduce damage taken for Shen and for adjacent allies. Shen's next 3 attacks deal bonus true damage.

skill.name: On the Hunt
skill.desc: Gain Attack Damage and grant Attack Speed to self and adjacent allies for 6 seconds.

skill.name: Divine Judgement
skill.desc:
Passive: Each time your team loses 20% of their total Health, gain 8 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

Active: Mana Reave the largest group of enemies within range. Deal magic damage to the center enemy and magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana by 20% until the next cast

skill.name: Unchain The Demon
skill.desc: Dash around the target and slam, dealing magic damage and healing for Health. Swipe after, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: Phantom Butterflies
skill.desc:
Passive: Start combat with 10 butterflies and gain one every 1 cast.

Active: Throw all butterflies at the current target, dealing magic damage for each butterfly.

Fated Bonus: Deal 10% more damage.

skill.name: Tongue Lash
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 3 seconds and deal magic damage to the current target. If Tahm Kench has more Health than them, deal magic damage instead. Otherwise, gain more Shield.

skill.name: Dim-Sum Delivery
skill.desc: Throw a spoiled dumpling at the nearest non-poisoned enemy, poisoning them for magic damage over 8 seconds.

skill.name: Guided Passage
skill.desc:
Grant Shield to Thresh and the lowest Health ally for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to enemies adjacent to both. Thresh shares % of his Armor and Magic Resist with the shielded ally for 6 seconds.

Fated Bonus: Gain 18 Armor and Magic Resist.

skill.name: Firecracker Frenzy
skill.desc: Gain Attack Damage for 6 seconds. Jump on the current target and deal physical damage to adjacent enemies, before bouncing to a safe location.

skill.name: Ram Slam / Tiger Strikes
skill.desc:
Ram Slam: Gain Shield for 3 seconds and charge through the current target, briefly knocking up any enemies he hits. Grab the nearest enemy and slam them into the ground, dealing total magic damage to them and adjacent enemies.

Tiger Strike: Gain 60% Attack Speed and empower Udyr's attacks for the next 6 seconds to strike 4 additional times dealing bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Ink Smash
skill.desc: Empower the next three attacks. The first two heal for Health and deal bonus magic damage. The final attack deals magic damage and Stuns the target for 1 second.
stats: Slam Damage: 10% Health + Slam Damage AP

skill.name: Legendary Prowess
skill.desc:
Cycle through the following abilities:

Throw staff out, dealing physical damage to the current target and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Spin, dealing physical damage to enemies within 1-hex range.

Dash to hit the most enemies in a 3-hex line, then slam down staff dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
stats: Slam Damage: Slam Damage AD + Slam Damage AP

skill.name: Feathers Fly!
skill.desc: Throw 12 feathers at the 4 closest enemies, each dealing physical damage. Then, recall the feathers, dealing physical damage to enemies they pass through.
stats: Recall Damage: Recall Damage AD + Recall Damage AP

skill.name: Dynamic Duo
skill.desc:
Xayah fires feathers at the nearest enemies, dealing physical damage.

Rakan dashes towards the largest clump of units, deals magic damage to and debuffs them, and gains a shield for each enemy hit.

skill.name: Steel Tempest
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks while Shielded deal bonus magic damage.

Active: Gain Shield for 5 seconds and deal magic damage to the current target.

Fated Bonus: Gain 300 Shield at the start of combat.
stats: Total Shield: @hield + Shield AR + Shield MR

skill.name: Fate Sealed
skill.desc:
Dash in spirit form to the furthest enemy within 3 Hexes for 3 seconds, dealing physical damage and Wounding enemies along the way for 5 seconds. While in spirit form, gain Shield and 75% Attack Speed. Afterwards, Yone returns to his starting position.

Each cast this combat increases his dash range by 1 Hex.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

skill.name: Dark Despoil
skill.desc: Sap power from the 2 nearest enemies, gainng max Health and dealing magic damage to them over 3 seconds.

skill.name: Calculated!
skill.desc:
Passive: Kills increase the number of ricochets by 1 for the rest of combat.

Active: Fire a missile dealing magic damage to the current target. The missile ricochets to the farthest unit within 2 hexes, dealing magic damage.

skill.name: Paper Thorns
skill.desc:
Summon 2 Vine Lashers that attack the nearest enemy 3 times. Their attacks deal magic damage and Wound their targets for 6 seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

traits.name: Altruist
traits.desc: Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Arcanist
traits.desc: Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.

stats.4: 50 AP for Arcanists; 20 AP for others
stats.6: 85 AP for Arcanists; 40 AP for others
stats.8: 125 AP for Arcanists; 125 AP for others

stats.1:
The Artist paints the champion you place in a special bench slot. Get a 1-star copy of the champion placed there when the Artist's work is complete.

Rounds to Complete = Unit Cost

traits.name: Behemoth
traits.desc: Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains 50% more for 5 seconds.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 100 maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

stats.8: 80% Health; Every 3 seconds, Bruisers deal 6% Health bonus physical damage on their next attack.

traits.name: Dragonlord
traits.desc: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

stats.4: 12% Health damage, and Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

traits.name: Dryad
traits.desc: Dryads gain Ability Power and 150 Health. Each enemy death grants additional Health.

traits.name: Duelist
traits.desc: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attacks, stacking up to 12 times.

traits.name: Exalted
traits.desc:
Your team gains 4% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store 1 XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.

traits.name: Fated
traits.desc: Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains 20% HP.

stats.5: All Fated champions get 200% of the Fated Bonus.
stats.7: All Fated champions get 300% of the Fated Bonus.
stats.10: All Fated champions gain 300% of EVERY Fated Bonus.

traits.name: Fortune
traits.desc:
When you lose a fight, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.

stats.3: Roll a die; in that many player combats, hold a Festival! At the Festival, you have the option to convert your Luck into rewards.
stats.5: Heal 3 player health at the start of each player combat.
stats.7: Fortune smiles! Gain extra rewards and more luck every turn no matter what, and hold a Festival every turn.

traits.name: Ghostly
traits.desc:
Upon dealing or taking damage 6 times, Ghostly units send 2 spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal 2% max Health every 2 seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

stats.1: Every 3 casts, Wukong grows his weapon, modifying his Abilities.

traits.name: Heavenly
traits.desc:
Heavenly champions grant a unique stat bonus to your team, increased by their star level and each Heavenly unit in play.

Kha'Zix - +15% Crit chance
Malphite - +8 AR/MR
Neeko - +60 HP
Qiyana - +10% AD
Soraka - +10% AP
Wukong - +10% AS
Emblem - +6% Omnivamp

2-stars grant 30% more.
3-stars grant 50% more.

traits.name: Inkshadow
traits.desc:
Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain 5% bonus damage and damage reduction.

Which Inkshadow items you get changes each game.

stats.3: An Inkshadow item (Different from each game)
stats.5: An Inkshadow item (Different from each game), and 5% more bonus damage and damage reduction.
stats.7: An Inkshadow item (Different from each game), and 15% more bonus damage and damage reduction.

traits.name: Invoker
traits.desc: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

stats.4: +20 Mana to Invokers; +5 Mana to others.
stats.6: +35 Mana to Invokers; +20 Mana to others

stats.1:
Change which Lover takes the field depending on whether they are placed in the front or back 2 rows. When the fielded Lover casts, the other provides a bonus effect.

Front: Trickshot Xayah
Back: Altruist Rakan

traits.name: Mythic
traits.desc:
Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage.

After 4 player combats, they become Epic, increasing the bonus by 50%.

stats.10: Instantly become Epic. The bonus is increased by 250% instead.

traits.name: Porcelain
traits.desc: After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for 4 seconds.

stats.2: Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain 20% Critical Strike Chance.
stats.4: Additionally, Reapers' bleed enemis for 45% true damage over 3 seconds.

traits.name: Sage
traits.desc: Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

traits.name: Sniper
traits.desc:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 Attack Range.

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

stats.6: 30% damage per hex. Snipers gain an additional 2 Attack Range.

stats.1: The first time the Spirit Walker drops below 50% Health, he unleashes the rage within, healing to full Health, gaining increased movement speed, and changing his Ability from Ram Slam to Tiger Strikes.

traits.name: Storyweaver
traits.desc:
Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.

Each Storyweaver star level increases Kayles Health and Ability Power. Kayle gets 15% Attack Speed for each game Stage.

traits.name: Trickshot
traits.desc: Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.

traits.name: Umbral
traits.desc:
The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.

stats.6: 1000 Shield and illuminate the whole board
stats.9: Executed enemies have a 100% chance to drop loot; 40% Health execute

traits.name: Warden
traits.desc: Wardens take less damage. For the first 10 seconds of combat, they take an additional 15% less damage.

items.name: Adaptive Helm
items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 20 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.
items.shortDesc:
Front Rows
+AR & MR
Back Rows
Bouns AP & Mana

items.name: Aegis of the Legion
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

​​[Support item]

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.
items.shortDesc:
Holder's ability
can crit and
deals bonus
critical dmg

items.name: Banshee's Veil
items.desc:
Combat Start: Grant the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25% Attack Speed for 18 seconds

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.shortDesc:
Immunity to
crowd control
for all allies
within 1 hex
in same row

items.name: B.F. Sword
items.desc: +10% Attack Damage

items.name: Blacksmith's Gloves
items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.desc:
Gain 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
items.fromDesc:
+20% Attack Damage
+15 Ability Power
+20 Magic Resist

items.name: Blue Buff
items.desc:
Max mana reduce by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 8% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.desc:
Gain 5% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies

Cooldown: 2 seconds
items.shortDesc:
Gain Bonus HP &
Reduce ATK DMG &
reflect dmg
to enemies

items.name: Chain Vest
items.desc: +20 Armor

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]
items.shortDesc:
+25 AP
+10 Mana
for all allies
within 2 hex
in same row

items.name: Crownguard
items.desc:
Combat start: Gain a 30% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 35 Ability Power.

items.name: Royal Crownshield
items.desc: Combat start: Gain a 50% max health Shield for 8 seconds. When the shield expires, gain 50 Ability Power.

items.name: Deathfire Grasp
items.desc:
Combat start: Blast the current target for 20% of their max Health as magic damage.

For the next 10 seconds, deal 25% more damage. Damage dealt to the blasted target is increased to 35%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Diamond Hands
items.desc:
Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.desc:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

items.name: Evenshroud
items.desc:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
items.shortDesc:
+25 AR & MR
Reduce enemy
AR and taking
within 2 Hex

items.name: Equinox
items.desc:
30% Sunder enemies within 3 hexes. Grant 50 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
items.shortDesc:
+50 AR & MR
Reduce enemy
AR and taking
within 3 Hex

items.name: Protector's Vow
items.desc: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

items.name: Bulwark's Oath
items.desc: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 50% max Health shield that lasts 10 seconds and gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist.
items.shortDesc:
Get shields, AR,
and MR at 40% HP

items.name: Tactician's Crown
items.desc: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

items.name: Gambler's Blade
items.desc:
Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 30 gold).

Each attack has a 4% chance to drop 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Giant's Belt
items.desc: +150 Health

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.desc: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.
items.fromDesc:
+30% Attack Damage
+20 Ability power
+10% Attack Speed

items.name: Goldmancer's Staff
items.desc:
Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 30 gold) and a 40% chance to drop 1 gold on enemy kill.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Guardbreaker
items.desc: After damaging a Shield, deal 25% more damage for 3 seconds.
items.fromDesc:
+150 Health
+20% Attack Speed
+10 Ability Power
+20% Crit Chance

items.name: Edge of Night
items.desc:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
When HP is low
shedding debuffs
& being stealth

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.desc: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

items.name: Hand Of Justice
items.desc:
Gain 2 effects:
* 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
* 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.desc:
Gain 20% Omnivamp, which also heals the lowest percent Health ally

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
items.shortDesc:
Heal from
all dmg.
The lowest ally
also heals

items.name: Hullcrusher
items.desc: Combat start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health.

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.desc:
Ability can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.
items.shortDesc:
Ability can crit.

If effect available
gain crit dmg.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.desc:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
items.shortDesc:
Reduce enemy
MR and taking
Magic dmg
within 2 Hex

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.desc: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

items.name: Jak'sho the Protean
items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 80 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 2 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 55 Ability Power. Gain 20 Mana every 3 seconds.

items.name: Last Whisper
items.desc:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor
items.fromDesc:
+15% Attack Damage
+25% Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.desc:
Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

[Support Item]

items.name: Deathblade
items.desc: Deal 8% bonus damage.

items.name: Archangel's Staff
